record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 11 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 11 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - January 30, 2008)

[Page: S503]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:34 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, January 31, 2008, at 11 a.m.
